item.title: Testing file system operations
item.description: On my previous project one of the areas that we needed to work out how to test was around interaction with the file system. The decision that we needed to make was whether we should unit test this type of functionality or whether it could just be covered by a functional test. To Unit Test One of the patterns to use when unit testing things like this is the Gateway pattern.
